00014 /*
00015  * We get this warning if we don't explicitly initalize gZero:
00016  *
00017  * C4132: 'gZero' : const object should be initialized
00018  *
00019  * But we can't explicitly initialize it since it is a union. So
00020  * we turn the warning off.
00021  */
00022 #pragma warning(disable:4132)
00023 CONST ALWAYSZERO gZero;
00024 #pragma warning(default:4132)
